map.startingArea.name: Greendale
map.startingArea.description: Greendale is a bustling township at the crossroads of adventure, with a myriad of shops, lodging, and pathways leading to different terrains. It's the perfect starting point for any wandering hero.
map.startingArea.rooms.room1.name: Town Square
map.startingArea.rooms.room1.description: The heart of Greendale, the Town Square is lively with traders, locals, and adventurers. The main pathways extend in all cardinal directions.
shop.shop1.name: Ye Olde Gear Emporium
shop.shop1.description: A one-stop shop for all adventurers' needs, from sturdy backpacks to essential travel gear.
map.startingArea.rooms.room2.name: North Gate
map.startingArea.rooms.room2.description: Marked by a grand archway, the North Gate is watched over by guards and is the passage to lands beyond.
map.startingArea.rooms.room3.name: Market Street
map.startingArea.rooms.room3.description: Lined with stalls and small shops, Market Street is always buzzing with bartering and haggling.
map.startingArea.rooms.room4.name: Merchants' Plaza
map.startingArea.rooms.room4.description: A spacious plaza where merchants from all over set up temporary shops during festivals.
map.startingArea.rooms.room5.name: North Road
map.startingArea.rooms.room5.description: The well-trodden North Road leads adventurers to distant forests and mountains.
map.startingArea.rooms.room6.name: Stone Bridge
map.startingArea.rooms.room6.description: An ancient stone bridge that crosses over the serene Misty River.
map.startingArea.rooms.room7.name: Crossroads
map.startingArea.rooms.room7.description: A strategic point where one can choose their path to fame: the mountains, the forest, or the northern plains.
map.startingArea.rooms.room11.name: Slowstream Path
map.startingArea.rooms.room11.descriptio: A gentle path that runs parallel to a babbling brook, leading to the South Gate.
map.startingArea.rooms.room12.name: South Gate
map.startingArea.rooms.room12.descriptio: A vital trade route into the city, the South Gate is always busy with merchants and travelers.
map.startingArea.rooms.room21.name: East Ave
map.startingArea.rooms.room21.descriptio: This bustling avenue is known for its fine eateries and inns, a great place for travelers to rest.
map.startingArea.rooms.room22.name: Artisans' Quarter
map.startingArea.rooms.room22.descriptio: Home to skilled craftsmen and their workshops, Artisans' Quarter is a hub of creativity and innovation.
map.startingArea.rooms.room23.name: Oldtown Bridge
map.startingArea.rooms.room23.descriptio: An ornate bridge that connects to the historical part of Greendale, known as Oldtown.
map.startingArea.rooms.room24.name: Oldtown
map.startingArea.rooms.room24.descriptio: The oldest part of Greendale, with cobblestone streets and ancient buildings teeming with history and mystery.
map.startingArea.rooms.room31.name: West Walkway
map.startingArea.rooms.room31.descriptio: A leafy walkway lined with trees and benches, perfect for a peaceful stroll.
map.startingArea.rooms.room32.name: Sunset Park
map.startingArea.rooms.room32.descriptio: A popular spot for locals to enjoy the outdoors, with views of the setting sun.
map.startingArea.rooms.room33.name: Traders' Trail
map.startingArea.rooms.room33.descriptio: A trail leading to the western farmlands, used by traders and farmers alike.
map.startingArea.rooms.room34.name: West Gate
map.startingArea.rooms.room34.descriptio: The West Gate opens to vast fields and is often used by farmers bringing in their harvest.
shop.shop2.name: The Enchanted Anvil
shop.shop2.description: A specialized shop where enchanted weapons and armor are crafted by the mystical blacksmiths of Greendale.
shop.shop3.name: The Old Scroll
shop.shop3.description: A quaint bookstore crammed with ancient tomes, maps, and scrolls of knowledge.
map.startingArea.rooms.room13.name: Baker's Alley
map.startingArea.rooms.room13.descriptio: A narrow alley filled with the delightful aroma of freshly baked goods, frequented by those seeking comfort food.
map.startingArea.rooms.room14.name: Herbalist's Lane
map.startingArea.rooms.room14.descriptio: An earthy lane where herbalists sell healing poultices, potions, and rare plants.
map.startingArea.rooms.room15.name: Dragonfly Pond
map.startingArea.rooms.room15.descriptio: A serene pond where dragonflies flutter, a popular meditation spot for monks and sages.
map.startingArea.rooms.room16.name: South Meadows
map.startingArea.rooms.room16.descriptio: Rolling meadows that stretch into the horizon, a place for pastoral bliss and nature's bounty.
map.startingArea.rooms.room17.name: South Road
map.startingArea.rooms.room17.descriptio: The South Road leads through the meadows and connects to distant farming villages and the sea.
map.startingArea.rooms.room18.name: South Gate Plaza
map.startingArea.rooms.room18.descriptio: The welcoming plaza just inside the South Gate, where travelers can find carriages and guides.
map.startingArea.rooms.room35.name: Farmland Path
map.startingArea.rooms.room35.descriptio: A dirt path leading through the abundant farmlands that feed the bustling town of Greendale.
map.startingArea.rooms.room36.name: Windmill Hill
map.startingArea.rooms.room36.descriptio: A hill topped with a large windmill, its sails turning steadily in the breeze.
map.startingArea.rooms.room37.name: Farming Hamlet
map.startingArea.rooms.room37.descriptio: A small settlement where the local farmers and their families live.
map.startingArea.rooms.room38.name: Western Woods
map.startingArea.rooms.room38.descriptio: A dense forest that marks the start of the wilds, with untold secrets hidden under its canopies.
